org.jooby.spi

Interface HttpHandler


  • public interface HttpHandler
    Bridge between Jooby app and a Server implementation. Server implementors are not required to implement this contract, instead they should use or inject the provided implementation.
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(NativeRequest request, NativeResponse response)
      Handle an incoming HTTP request.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

            NativeResponse response)
     throws Exception
        Handle an incoming HTTP request.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP request.
        response - HTTP response.
        Throws:
        Exception - If execution resulted in exception.
